name: stigviewer-cfml
author: Chris Simmons (csimmons.dev)
shortDescription: CommandBox module for reading, filtering, and rendering DISA STIG XCCDF content.
description: StigViewer CFML is a CommandBox module that provides CLI tools for working with DISA STIG XCCDF files. It supports summarizing STIG benchmarks, filtering rules by severity or STIG category (CAT I/II/III), exporting rule data to JSON, and rendering official DISA XSL stylesheets into HTML reports using CFML.
